title: Cognitive Network Development Strategy Through cMOOC-Based Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Professional development for pre-service or in-service teachers, featuring a connectivist learning approach in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Engage in three or more meaningful interactions with peers and instructors for scientific problem-solving
Construct personalized cognitive maps and explain 80%+ of their relational connections based on learning content
Achieve 70+ scores in task completion rates and concept comprehension assessments in intensive short-term learning environments
Compare and analyze cognitive network characteristics across learner types (success/failure, long-term/short-term)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
